Release history
---------------

development
+++++++++++

0.0.3 (2018-09-23)
++++++++++++++++++

- Established initial public API
- Improved documentation, user guide
- Field aliases
- Deserialization

0.0.2 (2018-08-21)
++++++++++++++++++

- Execution of basic GraphQL queries
- Convert GraphQL schema to python types (undocumented)
- Write GraphQL in python syntax (undocumented)

0.0.1
+++++

- initial version
